summary: This document is a Certificate of Corporate Resolutions for Jeepers, Inc., authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts for the corporation. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke, and confirms the corporation's compliance with applicable laws.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for Jeepers, Inc., allowing him to manage the corporation's accounts with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is also named as an authorized signer for Jeepers, Inc., with similar powers to manage the corporation's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Lipstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Lipstein is identified as the Secretary of Jeepers, Inc., certifying the corporate resolutions.

connections.description: Both are authorized signers for Jeepers, Inc., indicating a professional relationship within the corporation.
Jeffrey Lipstein, as Secretary, certifies the corporate resolutions involving Epstein, indicating a formal corporate relationship.

keyFacts: The document certifies corporate resolutions for Jeepers, Inc. authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage accounts.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are named as authorized signers for the corporation.
The document outlines the powers granted to the authorized signers regarding the management of corporate accounts.
Jeffrey Lipstein is identified as the Secretary of Jeepers, Inc., certifying the resolutions.
The corporation is stated to be organized and existing under the laws of the US Virgin Islands.
